content: He’s not going to win it, but maybe he should. Maybe the Warriors are about to rampage through the playoffs and win another title, and maybe Curry continues to rack up records and wins and MVPs. Brandon Anderson is brilliant — Steph Curry is the fUckin’ MVP, people. even if you ascribe to the theory that he & durant should “cancel each other out,” there’s no denying that Durant went to GS because of Curry.
